response.name: Secret Text
response.description: Select this option if you want a string (like a password) to be encrypted
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SecretText
  name: name
  description: ""
  identifier: identifier
  spec:
    secretManagerIdentifier: secretManager
    valueType: Inline

response.name: Secret File
response.description: Select this option if you want a file (like a certificate) to be encrypted
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SecretFile
  name: name
  description: ""
  identifier: identifier
  spec:
    secretManagerIdentifier: secretManager

response.name: SSH Key
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SSHKey
  name: name
  description: ""
  identifier: identifier
  spec:
    authScheme: SSH
    port: 22
    spec:
      credentialType: Password
      spec:
        userName: asdasd
        password: acc.password
